title: Bug 6304 - Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, an error occurs, and the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully handle cases where a .java file and another resource, like a .properties file, are selected simultaneously in the package viewer. Users should be able to synchronize these files without encountering errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Initiate the synchronization process and observe the encountered error.
